channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Did Afghanistan shoot down Pakistan’s F-16 jet amid new clashes?
Why Pakistan has launched ‘open war’ against Afghanistan
From trade to Ukraine war, the key takeaways from Merz's visit to China
What to expect from Canada PM Mark Carney’s first India visit?
FirstUp: Canada’s Carney begins India visit and other big news today
FTA in the making, UPI & more: How successful was PM Modi’s Israel visit?
Dealing with China: How India is developing deterrence infrastructure in Northeast
item.description: Rapid mobilisation, air power superiority, and uninterrupted logistics convert the eastern theatre from a vulnerability into a zone of credible deterrence

item.title: Tariffs, turmoil and the midterms: Beginning of the end of the Trump era
item.description: From tariff turmoil to electoral uncertainty, US President Donald Trump confronts the gravest test of his second term.

item.title: Calibrated engagement: PM Modi’s Israel visit signals India’s nuanced West Asia doctrine in motion
item.description: West Asia will remain complex. But complexity, handled with patience and prudence, can be an opportunity rather than a liability.

item.title: PM Modi in Jerusalem: How aerospace, AI and Iron Dome are the next chapter in India-Israel ties
item.description: Future India-Israel defence cooperation will focus heavily on joint development, co-production and technology transfer in cutting-edge areas such as AI, cyber and drones

item.title: How the end of panda diplomacy signals the deepening rift in China-Japan ties
item.description: The departure of Japan’s last giant pandas marks more than the end of a diplomatic tradition; it reflects the deepening chill in China-Japan relations

item.title: Why Hormuz, not Fordow, is the real centre of gravity in the Iran crisis
item.description: The central policy variable in the confrontation is not the technical status of Iran’s nuclear programme but the stability of a critical global chokepoint
